FreeWheel AdManager Cocoa Touch SDK

The FreeWheel AdManager Cocoa Touch SDK is a static library for integrating your cocoa touch applications with FreeWheel MRM ad services.

The SDK supports iOS 3.0+ running on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. It is a universal binary bundle with armv6, armv7 and i386 architectures.

The SDK may utilize UIKit intensively, so invoke from main thread is highly preferred, otherwise crash may occur.

To use the SDK,

  • Open "Project Info" window, select "Build" tab, add "-ObjC" in "Other Linker Flags".
  • Add libxml2.dylib, UIKit.framework, CoreGraphics.framework, QuartzCore.framework, MediaPlayer.framework, CoreLocation.framework to your project.
  • Add AdManager.framework to your project.
  • Add "#import <AdManager/FWSDK.h>" in your code.
  • Register the following built-in module class in MRM UI: FWVideoAdRenderer FWOverlayAdRenderer FWDisplayAdRenderer FWMRAIDAdRenderer FWNullAdRenderer FWVastTranslator
  • Add and register additional 3rd party renderer framework to your project (optional) Use the macro FW_LINK_RENDERER(<renderer class name>) in .m file outside any , eg: FW_LINK_RENDERER(FWSkeletonRenderer)
